app.extras module¶

_summary_

INTEGRA 2023 Platform Server extras File

This file is part of the INTEGRA 2023 platform flask server. This contains the extra functions required to calculate energy efficiency indicators using the variables associated with the system.

@Author: Alex Pinchao @Date: 18-10-2022

app.extras.return_indicators_calculation()[source]¶

generates a dictionary that contains the energy indicators taken into account by the platform between the years 2010 and 2020.

Returns:

dictionary of energy indicators

Return type:

dict_total_indicadores

app.forms module¶

INTEGRA 2023 Platform Server Forms File

This file is part of the INTEGRA 2023 platform flask server. It integrates the data model for the User’s session information required for the server built-in login.

@Author: Mateo Barrera

@Date: 12-07-2022

app.models module¶

INTEGRA 2023 Platform Server Models File

This file is part of the INTEGRA 2023 platform flask server. It integrates the data model for the User’s session information required for the server built-in login.

@Author: Mateo Barrera

@Date: 12-07-2022

class app.models.UserData[source]¶

Bases: object

User information class Management information for the user’s session on the server.

__init__(username, password, mail, data=None)[source]¶
class app.models.UserModel[source]¶

Bases: UserMixin

UserModel class Manages the information inside the session for the user. :param UserMixin: Extend the flask object for manage of the user’s session. :type UserMixin: Flask UserMixin Object

__init__(user_data)[source]¶

Constructor for UserModel class :param user_data: User information. :type user_data: UserData object

static query(user_id)[source]¶

Generate the factory funtion for session validation query :param user_id: id key from user data on database User Table. :type user_id: str

Returns:

UserModel class instance for the log user.

Return type:

User info
